q: In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come," Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too: There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. " Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him." The change in command overshadowed Google Inc. So David Letterman reaches down from behind the desk and produces a bottle of Grey Goose, to which Betty White laughs heartily. They share some vodka, then she does a classic spit-take.
